text: Anita Rose Morris (March 14, 1943 â€“ March 2, 1994) was an American actress, singer and dancer. She played Carol in Ruthless People in 1986. She also acted in other roles. The actress was born in Durham, North Carolina. She died from ovarian cancer in Los Angeles at age 50. Morris was married to Grover Dale at the time of her death. They had one son, actor James Badge Dale. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:People from Durham, North Carolina Category:Singers from North Carolina Category:Actors from North Carolina Category:1943 births Category:1994 deaths
title: Anita Morris
